baby-animals.name: National Geographic Baby Animals
baby-animals.fullName: National Geographic Baby Animals Display Themes
baby-animals.description: National Geographic Display Themes turns every drive into an adventure
baby-animals.kvTitle:
Dive into Wonder
with National Geographic in your Kia!
baby-animals.mobileKvTitle:
Dive into Wonder with
National Geographic
in your Kia!
baby-animals.kvSubtitle: Personalize your dashboard with National Geographic themes that will inspire your drive.

Personalize your dashboard with National

features.title: Cluster Display
features.description: Watch adorable baby animals come to life on your cluster display

features.title: Welcome Message
features.description: Start every journey with heartwarming wildlife scenes

discoverFeatures.title: Discover Playful Designs
discoverFeatures.videoDescription: National Geographic themed motion graphics play once at start-up (from sleep mode) and shutdown.

cards.title: Cluster
cards.description: The selected National Geographic theme appears on the cluster with themed graphics and gauges.
cards.note: ※ Depending on the vehicle model, the cluster screen design may differ from the image above.

cards.title: Navigation
cards.description: National Geographic photography highlights your current location during navigation.

cards.title: Homecard
cards.description: National Geographic photographs appear across various menu screens.

cards.title: Profile
cards.description: Choose from National Geographic-themed profile images—choose a unique one for each driver.

mobileDiscoverFeatures.title: Discover Playful Designs
mobileDiscoverFeatures.videoDescription: Disney National Geographic-themed motion graphics play once at start-up (from sleep mode) and shutdown.

cards.title: Cluster
cards.description: The selected Disney Theme appears on the cluster with themed graphics and gauges.
cards.note: ※ Depending on the vehicle model, the cluster screen design may differ from the image above.

cards.title: Navigation
cards.description: Disney National Geographic artwork highlights your current location during navigation.

cards.title: Homecard
cards.description: Artwork of Disney National Geographic graphics and logos appear across various menu screens.

cards.title: Profile
cards.description: Choose from Disney National Geographic-themed profile images—choose a unique one for each driver.
